title: Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou: Maboroshi no Bouken to Kiseki no Kaigou
content:
This special episode of "Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou" was an absolute waste of time. Clocking in at a whopping 40 minutes, it felt like a never-ending nightmare that left me questioning why I even bothered to watch it.

The plot was a complete mess, and it was clear that the writers had no idea what they were doing. The story had no real purpose and was completely unrelated to the main plot, making it feel like an afterthought that was hastily put together.

To make matters worse, the animation was mediocre at best, with poorly choreographed fight scenes and lackluster character designs. The sound quality wasequally disappointing, with forgettable background music and unimpressive voice acting.

Overall, "Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou: Maboroshi no Bouken to Kiseki no Kaigou" was a complete disaster. It lacked any real substance, failed to engage its audience, and left me feeling like I had wasted 40 minutes of my life that I will never get back. Save yourself the trouble and skip this one. I give it a generous 4/10, only because the end credits were decently animated.
